#summary This page lists the sequence in which various PTX instructions and their respective opcode will be probed

= PTX Probing Priority =
This page lists the sequence in which various PTX instructions and their respective opcode will be probed.

The lesser the indent, the greater the priority.
<pre>
===First Group===
mov, ld, st, add, sub

===Second Group===
set, setp, testp, neg, and, or, mul, bra, call, ret, exit

=== By Type ===
====Integer Instructions====
 add //addition, all 6 types
sub //substraction, 6 types
mul //multiplication
neg //negate
	abs //absolute
	min
	max
	mad //multiply+add
	sad //sum of absolute difference
	div //division
	rem //remainder
		popc //one count
		clz  //count leading zero
		bfind
		brev
		bfe
		bfi
		prmt
		add.cc, addc
		sub.cc, subc
		mul24
		mad24

====Floating Point Instructions====
 testp
add
sub
mul
div
	fma
	mad
	abs
	neg
	min
	max
	rcp
	sqrt
	rsqrt
		copysign
		sin
		cos
		lg2
		ex2

====Comparison and Select Instructions====
 set
setp
	selp
	slct

====Logical Shift Instructions====
 and
or
	xor
	not
	cnot
	shl
	shr

====Data Movement and Conversion Instructions====
 mov
ld
st
	ldu
	prefetch, prefetchu
	isspacep
	cvta
	cvt


====Texture And Surface====
	tex
	tld4
	txq
	suld
	sust
	sured
	suq

====Execution Control Instructions====
 bra
call
ret
exit

====Parallel Synchronization and Communication Instructions====
	bar
	membar
	atom
	red
	vote

</pre>
